data.name: Roasted Broccoli
data.description: This easy roasted broccoli recipe delivers a perfect balance of golden crispy-crunchy bits and crisp-tender stems. Dress them up however you like.

recipeInstructions.text:
Preheat oven to 450°. Toss broccoli and oil on a rimmed baking sheet; season with salt and pepper. Roast, tossing occasionally, until tender and browned, 25–35 minutes.


Editor’s note: This recipe was originally published in November 2015. Head this way for more of our best vegetable recipes →

recipeIngredient: 2 large heads of broccoli, cut into large florets with some stalk attached
Kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper

ingredients.input: 2 large heads of broccoli, cut into large florets with some stalk attached
ingredients.name: broccoli
ingredients.comment: cut into large florets with some stalk attached
